mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kejinTest.d_operation_collect ( settle_date, total_asset, regular_asset, new_register, new_tie_card, new_invest, charge_amount, charge_num, cash_amount, cash_num, other_regular_num, total_regular_amount, total_regular_num, new_regular_amount, reinvest_regular_amount, credit_amount, credit_num, regular_recovery_amount, regular_recovery_num, regular_daily_growth, regular_daily_rail, month_regular_amount, month_recovery_amount, month_unrecovery_amount, regular_invest_num, reinvest_rate, active_num, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED ) VALUES ( jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sixMonthNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{twelveMonthAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{twelveMonthNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{otherRegularAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{otherRegularNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalRegularAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalRegularNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{newRegularAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reinvestRegularAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creditNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regularRecoveryAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regularRecoveryNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regularDailyGrowth, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regularDailyRail, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthRegularAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthRecoveryAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{monthUnrecoveryAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regularInvestNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reinvestRate,
